title: Where Do We Come From? What Are We? Where Are We Going?
description: The big bang theory states that about 13.7 billion years ago all the matter in the Universe was concentrated into a tiny point and then exploded. Up until now, the universe is still expanding. Formed 4.6 billion years ago, the Solar System is home to the sun, and eight planets: Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune.
